talk.author: did:plc:ygrhhcpm7upmlhjgbouw7jwc
talk.utter: Parents of 337 migrant children separated at border under Trump still have not been found, court filing says!

talk.author: did:plc:ivj63werg3ooil6n6hbcb3ic
talk.utter:
337...chump change. 
Biden cannot account for 300,000+ children...where are they? But no worries. The Trump admin will find them.

talk.author: did:plc:ygrhhcpm7upmlhjgbouw7jwc
talk.utter:
But experts say

“This is not a ‘missing kids’ problem; it’s a ‘missing paperwork’ problem,” Jonathan Beier, associate director of research and evaluation for the Acacia Center for Justice’s Unaccompanied Children Program, wrote in an email.

talk.author: did:plc:ygrhhcpm7upmlhjgbouw7jwc
talk.utter:
But experts say

“This is not a ‘missing kids’ problem; it’s a ‘missing paperwork’ problem,” Jonathan Beier, associate director of research and evaluation for the Acacia Center for Justice’s Unaccompanied Children Program, wrote in an email.

talk.author: did:plc:ivj63werg3ooil6n6hbcb3ic
talk.utter: Bull. That is a disgusting egregious heinous statistic and you should be outraged and want to do everything possible to find these children some of whom are surely being abused. Put aside your political affinities and take a stand on this travesty.

talk.author: did:plc:ygrhhcpm7upmlhjgbouw7jwc
talk.utter: trump was and will be at fault!!  Stop being so angry that you are blind!!

talk.author: did:plc:ygrhhcpm7upmlhjgbouw7jwc
talk.utter: trump was and will be at fault!!  Stop being so angry that you are blind!!

talk.author: did:plc:ivj63werg3ooil6n6hbcb3ic
talk.utter: Ok so Trump is at fault for Biden being unable to account for 300k+ children?  Whatever you say. But even more frightening is your indifference for those kids. The hypocrisy is epic.

talk.author: did:plc:ygrhhcpm7upmlhjgbouw7jwc
talk.utter: The children should never have been made a pawn, they are innocent! But you are the one that made it political by blaming Biden!  Get off your high horse !
